resources.string:
• Please check on the website for movement plan, accommodation, key event dates etc. and download the mobile app.

 • Travel Light and carry medicines if advised by the doctor.

 • Be aware of the facilities like Hospitals, Food, and Emergency Services etc.

 • Know emergency contact numbers.

 • Use only the Bathing areas/Ghats that are authorized by the Mela administration.

 • Use toilets and urinals available.

 • Use dustbins for disposal of Waste.

 • Use signage for way finding.

 • Use parking spots for parking of vehicles and follow traffic rules.

 • Inform the Police or Mela Administration if any unidentified or suspicious object is found.

 • Follow the rules, regulations and instructions given through the Public Addressal System or any other mode.

 • Cooperate with the Departments involved in organizing the Mela.

 • Be attentive towards your belongings and Use Lost & Found Centres for the loss of beloved and belongings.

• Don't carry valuables, unnecessary food and clothing.

 • Don't trust strangers, don't eat at unauthorised places.

 • Don't attract unnecessary conflicts by provoking peers.

 • Don't venture into the river beyond permissible limits.

 • Don't pollute the rivers by using soaps, detergents for cleaning/washing purposes or by throwing Pujan Samagri.

 • Don't be in crowded places if suffering from a contagious disease.

 • Don't use plastic bags in the city and mela area during the Maha Kumbh Mela.

The Maha Kumbh 2025 will provide devotees and visitors with a unique experience of faith and culture, serving as a hub for grand performances by renowned Indian artists. The Triveni Pandals, Yamuna Pandals, and Saraswati Pandals are ready to accommodate 2,000 spectators each. In Prayagraj, a total of 24 stages will host folk music, classical dance, and poetry recitals. This Maha Kumbh is not just a religious event but also a vibrant celebration of Indian culture and traditions. Download the List of all the Kumbh Mela Events.

The Uttar Pradesh Government\'s 24-member Advisory Committee, led by the ADG of Prayagraj Zone, has developed a comprehensive traffic plan for efficient management and devotee safety. Download the issued advisory by clicking the button below.

Avoid Visits to Prayagraj During Shahi Snan and Main Parva Dates. In view of heavy crowds and heightened security concerns during the Shahi Snan and Main Parva of the Maha Kumbh Mela, security and protocol assistance for VVIPs, VIPs, and dignitaries cannot be assured. Dignitaries are kindly requested to avoid visiting Prayagraj on these dates to prevent inconvenience and support the smooth conduct of the event. Download the issued advisory by clicking the button below.

The Government of UP in collaboration with MyGov is pleased to unveil an exciting and enlightening Quiz competition, a delightful component of Mahakumbh 2025. This competition is a splendid opportunity for all, as we come together to honour Mahakumbh’s profound wisdom and its enduring contributions to society. Join us in this commemoration, as your participation adds vibrancy to our cultural heritage and helps to extend the discourse on timeless significance. All participants will be given a digital e-Certificate of Participation.

The top 3 winners will be rewarded with below mentioned prize:

1st Prize: Rs. 20,000/-
2nd Prize: Rs. 15,000/-
3rd Prize: Rs. 10,000/-
Agency for Amusement Zones in Maha Kumbh Mela 2025

Maha Kumbh Mela is an auspicious occasion, which blends spirituality, culture, tradition, and offers a unique opportunity for organizations to connect with millions of hearts. Prayagraj Mela Authority have selected a vendor for amusement zones for the upcoming Maha Kumbh Mela, the world's largest human congregation on earth. For more information on amusement zones connect with our authorized vendor:

Agencies for Food Court for Maha Kumbh Mela 2025

The Maha Kumbh Mela, an occasion known for its deep spiritual importance and the convergence of varied traditions, transforms food court areas into more than commercial outlets. These spaces serve as retreats for visitors to rejuvenate, savour a multitude of tastes, and immerse themselves in the authentic essence of Indian cuisine.
For more information on collaboration for food court connect with our authorized vendors:

Land and Suvidha Allotment Portal for Maha Kumbh 2025

The Land and Suvidha allotment system for Maha Kumbh Mela 2025 will be available online from October 29, 2024. The Prayagraj Mela Authority respectfully invites esteemed Sansthas to apply for Land and Suvidha for Maha Kumbh Mela 2025 by visiting the official website www.mklns.upsdc.gov.in to register/login. Applications and requests for allotment will be accepted through this portal until 12th November 2024. Post allotment of land and Suvidha, the Sanstha shall be able to view and download their Suvidha Parchis through this portal.\nFor further information or assistance, please visit the FAQ page of the Land and Suvidha Allotment System or contact the Land and Suvidha Allotment Counter at the Prayagraj Mela Authority office, near Veni Bandh, Parade Ground, Daraganj, Prayagraj, Uttar Pradesh, 211006.
Prayagraj Aur Kumbh – Sanskritik Vaibhav ki Abinav Gatha
Kumbh Mela - Pilgrimage to the Greatest Cosmic Fair
Kumbh Mela: Myths, Significance and Reality
Kumbh Mela (Glimpses of Rituals and faith)
Kumbh Mela and Sadhus - The Quest for Immortality
What are the Do’s and Don’ts for tourists?
As a first-time visitor to the biggest holy gathering, you must be prepared with basic instructions about what to do and what not. You can check these instructions below.
What are the famous places to see in Prayagraj?

Some of the famous places in Prayagraj are Triveni Sangam, Sri Mankameshwar Mandir, Chandrashekhar Azad Park, Anand Bhawan Museum, University of Allahabad, ISKCON Temple, Shri Bade Hanuman Ji Mandir, etc.
To reach Prayagraj by air/train or road, please visit here.
What are the main bathing dates of Maha Kumbh Mela 2025?
The Maha Kumbh Mela is to be held in Prayagraj in the year 2025 from the 13th of January to the 26th of February. To know more visit here.

Explore the sacred gathering like never before with our app, designed to make your journey seamless and memorable. From detailed maps, event schedules, and holy rituals to nearby accommodations and emergency assistance, we have got you covered. Dive into the spiritual aura of the worlds largest congregation with ease and convenience at your fingertips!
Welcome to the ultimate guide for Maha Kumbh Mela 2025!
